data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Shahdol against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,041,438 who are far from you in Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Rajput Ponwar (Hindu traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help 213 new simple churches start among the 1,066,100 people in the county of Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Shahdol.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Shahdol, Madhya Pradesh, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
